2.「おお レーノス ちょうどいいところに。| お前さんと <pc>で 組んで| や: Oh, Renosu, just the man for the job. I have a|job I need you and <pc> to work on.

3.「はあっ？ この新米とぉ！？| んなの ユウギリに 任せときゃいいのに……。: Huh? With this newbie? Why don't you just|leave that to Yugiri?

4.「先日 ユウギリからの報告で| モリナラ大森林の樹木が 許可なく| 伐採されてい: A few days ago, Yugiri reported to us that|trees in the Molinara Forest are being cut|down without permission.

5.「今回の任務は この犯人を見つけだし| 不法な伐採を やめさせることじゃ。| ふ: Your mission this time is to find this|criminal and put an end to illegal logging.|We'll do our best to work together.

6.「……うーくっくっくっ。| 伐採をやめさせるよう がんばっさい！| ……くっくっ: ...oo-hee-hee. I'll do my best to stop the|logging! Hee-hee-hee...

7.「オレひとりで 充分ですって。| こんな新米 連れてったら うまくいくものも|: I'm good enough on my own. If you take a|newbie like her, even things that will go well|will go wrong.

8.「ちゅーわけで オレは ひとりで行くからよ。| お前は お前で 好きにしな。: That's why I'm going alone. You do what you|want.

9.「なんだ あのレーノスってのは？| いちいち 相棒のことを 半人前あつかいして|: What's with that Renosu guy? He's so annoying,|treating his partner like he's half a man.

10.「おおかた 選ばれし レンジャーである| 相棒に シットしてるんだろうぜ。| ハ: Most likely, he's sitting with his buddy who's|the chosen ranger. Hahan! You're a small man.

11.「まあまあ スピルどの。| レーノスは あれで 優秀なレンジャー。| 彼なりの考: Well, well, well. Spiel, which one. Renosu is|a good ranger. I'm sure he has his own ideas.

12.「……で レーノスの奴は ああ言っておったが| お前さんは どうする <pc>？: So, Renosu said that, but what about you,|<pc>? Would you accept this|assignment?

13.「それでは 頼んだぞ。| まずは 先日見つけたという 切り株が| たくさんある場: Now then, I'll leave you to it. First of all,|let's go to the place where you found a lot of|stumps the other day.

14.「では 頼んだぞ……と思ったら| なんじゃ その 頼まれごとの数は！？: Now, I'm going to ask you for a favor... but|what's with all the favors you're getting?

15.「それでは 仕事のひとつも 頼めんぞ！| ええい。さっさと 手を空けてくるのじゃ: I can't ask you to do a single job for me|then! No. Go get your hands off of it!

16.「選ばれし レンジャーの任務としては| 役不足というわけか。強気じゃのう。| 部: So you're not up to the task of being the|chosen ranger? You're a hard man, aren't you?|I'm gonna turn my men into tengu.

18.「やっぱり お前も 来たのか。| チッ！ オレひとりで 充分だってのに| 足手ま: So you came too, after all. Damn! I'm good|enough on my own, but you're slowing me|down...

19.「おうおう だまって聞いてりゃ| さっきから ずいぶんと うちの相棒を| こき下: Oh, oh, if you'll just shut up and listen,|you've been talking down to my partner for|quite a while now.

20.<if_woman>「たしかに 相棒は ボンヤリしたとこもあるが| このオレ様が:
You're right, my partner may be a|bit of a spear, but she's the one I'm looking|up to. She's a better ranger than you are!|
|You're right, my partner may be a bit of|a spear, but he's a man after my own heart.|He's a better ranger than you are!

21.「フン……こいつが ウワサの精霊か。| いい機会だ。ぜひとも その才能ってやつを: So this is the spirit of rumor. This is a good|opportunity. Let's have him prove his talent|by all means.

22.「今から オレは この広大な森の中から| 木を伐採した犯人を 見つけだすからよ。: From now on, I'm going to find out who cut|down the trees in this vast forest. You can|search on your own.

23.「それでもし オレよりも先に| 犯人を見つけだすことが できたなら| お前のこと: If you can find the culprit before I do, I'll|be happy to give you credit.

24.「まあ この森は オレにとっちゃ| 庭みてーなもんだ。| やる前から 勝負は見え: Well, this forest is like a garden to me. I|can see the game before I even start.

25.「こうなりゃ 先に犯人を見つけだして| あいつのハナを 明かしてやろうぜ！| 森: Now let's find out who did this and find out|his Hana! We've got to go deep into the forest|and investigate!

26.「こらーっ！| お前ら 何してやがる！！: Hey! What the hell are you doing!

27.「やべえ！ レンジャー協会だっ！: Oh, no! It's the Ranger Association!

28.「……どうする ズラかるか？: What are we going to do, lose him?

29.「いや。いい機会だ。| 宣戦布告してやろうじゃないか。: Nope. It's a good opportunity. Let's declare|war.

30.「オレたちは 伐採同盟。| 自らの自由意思で 森を切りひらき| 未来をも 切りひ: We are the Logging Alliance. We're an|organization that will cut our way through the|forest and into the future of our own freedom!

31.「なーにが 伐採同盟だ！| ようするに 無法者の集まりじゃねーか！: What's with the logging alliance! In short,|it's a bunch of outlaws!

32.「モリナラ大森林の自然を守る| エルトナ・レンジャー協会 モリナラ支部の| <c: <cs_pchero> of the Molinara Chapter of the|Eltona Rangers Association for the Protection|of Nature in the Molinara Forest will put it|down!

33.「自然を守る……か。笑わせるな！| 森は ヒトの侵入を拒む 危険な領域だ！| そ:
Protecting nature...huh? Don't make me laugh!|The forest is a dangerous area that refuses to|be invaded by humans! There is no need to|
|protect it!

34.「な なに 勝手なこと言ってやがる！| 森は 地上に生きる すべての生物にとって: What are you talking out of your backside! The|forest is an irreplaceable place for all|living things on earth!

35.「……しょせん わかりあえないか。| やはり 貴様らとは 戦うしかないようだ。|: I guess we can't understand each other after|all. I guess I'll have to fight you guys after|all. Let's go, logging machine!

36.「また レンジャー協会が 来やがったぜ！: The Ranger Association is at it again!

37.「……どうする？| 今度こそ ズラかるか？: So... what do we do? You want to lose it this|time?

38.「フン！ | 何度来ようと けちらしてやるだけだ！| さあ 行けっ 伐採マシィィ: Hmph! No matter how many times they come,|we'll just kick their asses! Let's go, logging|machine!

39.「くそっ！| 伐採同盟の奴ら 相棒が 戦っている間に| とっとと 逃げちまったよ: Damn! Looks like the Logging Alliance got away|while my partner was fighting.

40.「よっ！ ご苦労だったな。: Yo! Thanks for your hard work.

41.「今ごろ やっと ご到着かよ。| オメーが ノロノロしてる間に| 相棒は 犯人を: You've finally arrived by now. While you were|slowing down, your partner found the culprit!

42.「なーに チョーシこいてやがる！| お前らが 来たときには オレは とっくに|: What the hell are you doing? I was long gone|by the time you guys got here, so I had to lay|low.

44.「連中のアジトをつきとめようと 隠れてたのに| お前が しゃしゃり出てきて 暴れ:
I was hiding to find out where they were|hiding, and then you came running out of|nowhere and started acting up, so I was|
|wondering what was going to happen.

45.「まっ 結局 ヤツらが 逃げだして| 後をつけれたから アジトは判明したけどな。: Well, in the end, they escaped and I was able|to follow them, so I was able to find out|where they were hiding. Goober.

46.「くっ……。じゃ じゃあ 今すぐ| そのアジトに 突入して| 伐採同盟の連中 と: Well then, let's break into that hideout right|now and take the logging alliance to task!

47.「……ったく これだから シロートは。| 見たとこ あいつらは かなりの大人数だ: That's why I like Shiroto. From the looks of|it, they're a pretty big group. There's no way|we're going in alone.

48.「とりあえず アジトの場所を報告して| 後は 支部長の判断に まかせんぞ。| こ: We'll just report the location of the hideout|and leave the rest to the branch manager's|discretion. We can't handle this guy.

49.「む～っ。ただの チャラい奴かと思ってたが| なかなか やるじゃねーか。| ……: Hmm~. I thought he was just a flashy guy, but|he's pretty good. ...What you're saying pisses|me off, though.

50.「しかたねえ。あいつの言うとおり| 今は 支部に戻るとしよーぜ 相棒。: Well, it is what it is. He's right. We'll go|back to the branch now, buddy.

51.「すでに レーノスから 話は聞いておるぞ。: I have already heard from Renosu.

52.「しかし 伐採同盟とはのう……。| そんな同盟と戦うことになるなんて| どう 命: But a logging alliance... how could I order|you to fight against such an alliance?

53.「……うーくっくっくっ。| 同盟と戦うのを どう命じるか……| くっくっくっ。: ...Woah woah woah. How do I order you to fight|the Alliance...ughhhh...ughhhh.

54.「なんだ よーやく 戻ったのか。| ずいぶん ごゆっくりだったな。: What a surprise, you're back at last. You've|taken your time.

55.「そうだ 支部長。| 例の任務は こいつに任せちゃどうです？: That's right, Branch Manager. Why don't you|let him take care of that mission?

56.「……ふーむ そうじゃのう。| ユウギリだと 道に迷いそうじゃし| <pc>が: Hmmm...yes. Yugiri might get lost, so|<pc> might be a good choice.

57.「じゃ そういうことで！| オレは 連中のアジトの| 見張りに 行ってきますよ。: Well, that's that then! I'm off to guard their|hideout.

Yes. I have to admit, based on Renosu's|report, that this branch alone does not have|the manpower to deal with the logging|
|alliances.

60.「王都カミハルムイの レンジャー本部に| 書状を出して 援軍を頼むことにしたんじ: I have decided to send a letter to the ranger|headquarters in Royal City Kamiharmui asking|for reinforcements.

64.「なーんか 相棒ってば メンドーな仕事を| 押しつけられたみたいだなぁ。| 悪い: I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to take the|day off. I'm sorry, but I'm going to take a|break.
